text: My Mind is a 7-inch vinyl EP from Portugal. The Man. It was put out right after Church Mouth and includes "My Mind" as the A-side, which was featured on Church Mouth. A song exclusive to this release is the Church Mouth B-side "Seventeen". This Single has only been released on 7-inch vinyl. The Single was only available at tour stops in Germany in late 2007, however left over copies have been sold on Portugal. The Man's most recent tour for $10.00 USD. No digital or compact disc releases of this album have been discussed. ==Track listing== # "My Mind" – 3:45 # "Seventeen" – 3:48 Category:Portugal. The Man albums
title: My Mind
